Title: Modifies the tax law to include elective cosmetic surgery as a taxable service
Summary: Modifies the tax law to include elective cosmetic surgery as a taxable service; but not including, reconstructive procedures necessary to treat congenital anomalies, developmental abnormalities, trauma, infection, or disease.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to including elective cosmetic surgery procedures as a taxable service
